s.text: An article says President Clinton waited too long to prepare the American public for military action in Kosovo.
Its strategy is faulty: Member countries are reluctant, Serbia is strong militarily, and NATO has forsworn the use of ground troops.
A patient narrates her face lift.
At first, she feels like "female goods in a dick-driven market," but a few weeks later finds her smoother, younger face a source of pleasure and confidence.
An exception: A top securities executive who was fired when he requested health benefits for his partner is now suing his old firm for $75 million.
The feminist magazine relaunches with articles on subjects predictable (female candidates for president, abortion clinic violence) and less so (adultery, the benefits of eating soy).
